programme.title: Sunny Side Up

programme.title: Platinum Jubilee 2022: Party at the Palace - Highlights Show
programme.desc: The Platinum Party at the Palace was a British music concert, held outside Buckingham Palace in London on 4 June 2022, in celebration of the Platinum Jubilee of Queen Elizabeth II.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - My Unique Farm
programme.desc: (Encore) Singaporean Wesley Godden traded his long non-profit career to start a 200-acre commercial sheep farm in rural Canada. Host Ming Tan joins him as a farmhand to find out what it takes to run the farm.

programme.title: Don't Forget The Lyrics USA S5
programme.desc: Don't Forget the Lyrics! is an American television game show in which contestants compete to win $1 million by correctly recalling song lyrics from a variety of genres.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S40
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Jimmy Shu's Taste Of The Territory
programme.desc: Jimmy is in the Darwin CBD. He tells us as Darwin continues to become more and more cosmopolitan, the city's dynamic food scene continues to grow. He tells us this last episode is a celebration of the best of the taste of the Top End.Jimmy Shu takes us into the kitchen of his own award-winning Darwin restaurant Hanuman, that opened in 1992. Jimmy tells us about his Chinese Sri Lankan background and how that has inspired his love of Indian/Malay/Nonya cuisine.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: The ever outrageous Zac the Sunrise, or rather his disguised identity the Masked Blader gets to know Toko and Nika. Zac challenges Wakiya to a battle and Wakiya is unable to refuse. Rantaro delivers terrible news to Valt that could change everything they know about the Bey club!

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Nefertine On The Nile
programme.desc: Nefertine is an eight-year-old girl who lives in ancient Egypt and is gifted with inexhaustible curiosity and courage. She occasionally gets herself into sticky situations, but luckily her trusted friend Piramses is always there to give her a hand. The two friends, accompanied by the cat Micerina, go on incredible adventures, from investigating mysterious mummies to discovering the secrets of the sphinx!

programme.title: Titipo The Little Train S2
programme.desc: Titipo had a little argument with Diesel. Then Titipo has to go on a long haul run, so he leaves the village for a while. Diesel regrets not making up with Titipo when he realized that Titipo had gone on a long haul. On the other hand, Titipo reaches the desert and sees a mirage and a strong sand storm for the first time in his life.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The Triangle Aliens have been using a weather machine to change the weather in Ollipolis. But their constant fighting created a tornado headed straight for town! How will Ollie, Sloppy, and Cherry stop the tornado and save the day? Things are getting hot in ollipolis. Sloppy builds everybody air-conditioned domes so that they can stay cool, but is that really the answer.

programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Chris Packham's Animal Einsteins
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brain power. Looking at a variety of animals, such as ravens, crows, bees and starlings, Chris explores how different animals can use tools, solve complex puzzles, recognise themselves in mirrors and even reason like humans.

programme.title: Chris Humfrey's Animal Instinct
programme.desc: Chris starts his day with some chill time on the couch watching TV with Edi and Eli, his cute four-week old baby emus. Then the adrenaline is pumping as Chris goes on a mission to collect ostrich eggs, whilst the dangerous Number Thirteen has him in his sights. We take a look at the challenging start to life for a pair of gorgeous Boobook owls. Chris introduces us to his newest captive breeding program, with the critically-endangered Mountain Pygmy Possums.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 16
programme.desc: Dennis and Mac get into inflatable furniture to deal with the economy's inflation, while Dee tries to find a place to crash after being evicted by her greedy landlord and Charlie wants to pitch Frank his crypto/online investment idea. And in this inflation episode everything gets bigger - Dee's desperation, Mac's lips, and even Charlie's apartment!

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S2
programme.desc: In this insightful and entertaining programme, Giles and Monica travel to South Africa - where they experience a land of contrasts through working in two very different hotels. The Silo is an industrialchic, luxury art-themed hotel in the heart of Cape Town. It sits in the former elevator shaft of a 90-year-old, 187-foot grain silo and on top of the new Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa - the African equivalent of the Tate Modern - within the same repurposed historic building.

programme.title: 星期二特写 ： 路上讨生活
programme.desc: 马路如虎口，有一大群的徳士、巴士、货车和重型车辆的司机每天都在凶险万分的“虎口”过日子。《路上讨生活》系列从司机角度出发，尝试反映他们在路上闯荡的“苦与乐”。日常所见的不仅是车水马龙、也探索新加坡的新事物，有机会让司机看遍人生百态、尝尽世态炎凉。手握方向盘，人生的未知在眼前，最美的风景在路上.

programme.title: 银色嘉年华 2023

programme.title: 幸福来了

programme.title: 遇见你真香
programme.desc: Martius拿着蘑菇草来找喜悦，想给她惊喜，不料却听到喜悦把他形容为乌云，想远离他为妙的话Martius失望离去。喜悦遗憾无法把蘑菇草给晨光，Zann想讨好晨光，派胜军出马想得到蘑菇草，却从女佣口中得知蘑菇草已经被送走了，Zann失望不已.

programme.title: 狮城有约

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: 自70年代起，越南开始出现许多畸形婴儿，以及生来就患有重病的儿童。这些疾病似乎都来自同一个根源—“橙剂”。这是一种高效除草剂，在越战时，被美国军方大量喷洒在越南各地。如今，战争结束已将近50年，不过，这个毒性极强的化学品仍在影响着越南第三代、甚至第四代的孩童.

programme.title: 异乡。驿客
programme.desc: 第一集 香港：什么是飞砂走奶？和尚跳海？茶餐厅俚语知多少？为何茶楼吃点心讲话得大声嚷？租礼服去派对，叮饭文化新时尚。地小房屋贵，拥有住屋是港人梦想。要如何融入香港社会，让异乡驿客秀丽素珊和住在香港的新加坡人告诉你.

programme.title: 爱情是Beautiful, 人生是Wonderful
programme.desc: Ep 69: 清儿告诉海朗，十月是海朗的亲哥哥，要她想办法救哥哥出来。但是海朗却不想认十月这个哥哥.

programme.title: 天生一对
programme.desc: 德特一家怀疑佳拉洁是凶手，决定找出真相。身处现代的佳苏兰，遭遇一场车祸，灵魂穿越时空回到了古代，附在佳拉洁身上.

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓
programme.desc: Ep 41: 正厚见春锡来三光公寓找纯情，借口要等住在这里的儿子回家，便待了下来。春锡碍于正厚在场，不敢对纯情无理，匆匆离去.

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓
programme.desc: Ep 42: 满情突然想起自己曾在狱中做医疗服务时，见过罗路。罗路来工地找弼洪，两人互相威胁.

programme.title: 大胃王来了-吃遍台湾
programme.desc: 郭彦均和蔡昌宪主持纬来综合台《大胃王来了!》两人轮周开吃拚收视，主持人王不见王，各自带领大胃王们吃遍台湾，从传统美食、夜市小摊到饭店大餐，呈现最原汁原味的料理，藉由大胃王们幸福地享用美食，让人看了食慾大开.

programme.title: 正义的重生
programme.desc: 9金熙宇审问文具俊，娴熟的模样一点都不像是新晋检察官10金熙宇正在记者会报告案情，却突然接到厅长的紧急电话，要求去掉了具旭清议员的名字.

programme.desc: Ep 41: 正厚见春锡来三光公寓找纯情，借口要等住在这里的儿子回家，便待了下来。春锡碍于正厚在场，不敢对纯情无理，匆匆离去.

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓
programme.desc: Ep 42: 满情突然想起自己曾在狱中做医疗服务时，见过罗路。罗路来工地找弼洪，两人互相威胁.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事S7
programme.desc: 这个节目介绍台湾当地的美食与老板背后的动人故事.

programme.title: 民族味
programme.desc: 闻名世界的西班牙小吃tapas是怎么开始的？传统西班牙料理深受信奉回教的摩尔人影响，但是回教文化忌吃猪肉，现代西班牙人却嗜猪如命，其火腿更是举世无双；这个演变如何开始的？《民族味》首播请随董姿彦到访这个饮食王国认识让人销魂的料理.

programme.title: 爱情是Beautiful, 人生是Wonderful
programme.desc: Ep 70: 雪儿表示自己已经原谅了振佑，但不想和华英有任何交集，所以不愿和振佑复合.

programme.title: 天生一对
programme.desc: 穿越时空回到了古代的佳苏兰，生活充满挑战。佳苏兰行为、习惯、说话方式怪异，让众人觉得莫名其妙.

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓
programme.desc: Ep 43: 弼洪主动联系正媛，要正媛承认他是彩云的生父。正媛听说他已经见过彩云，气得泼了弼洪一脸水.

programme.title: Oh! 三光公寓
programme.desc: Ep 44: 彩云支持纯情和春锡讲清楚，和在熙陪她去见春锡，三人在正媛的带领下，找春锡对质.

programme.title: 生活达人S15
programme.desc: 本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的.

programme.title: 正义的重生
programme.desc: 9金熙宇审问文具俊，娴熟的模样一点都不像是新晋检察官10金熙宇正在记者会报告案情，却突然接到厅长的紧急电话，要求去掉了具旭清议员的名字.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.
